text:
1. edit jmeter.properties. find gui.quick_8, edit as follow
qui.quick_8=SummaryReport

2. start jmeter3.1

3. in Jmeter, Add a Thread Group, then press Ctrl - 8, nothing happens.

4. if you using Jmeter3.0, Summary Report componennt will appear in Thread Group.

It's easy to review this, so I do not provide additional info such as screenshot.
creator: hppyhjh@163.com

text:
Hello,
I don't reproduce issue under MacOSX.
It works fine for me.
Can you check you don't have a third party plugin installed ?
Also which JVM are you using ?
Thanks

3.happens in Windows 7 Home edition. the following is detail:
